trans-unit.source: Add a tag in git to mark the release: “git tag VERSION -m’Adds tag VERSION for pypi’ ” Push the tag to git: git push –tags origin master
trans-unit.target: Add a tag in git to mark the release: “git tag VERSION -m’Adds tag VERSION for pypi’ ” Push the tag to git: git push –tags origin master

trans-unit.source: Build both the sources and the wheel. Do not change anything in setup.py between creating the wheel and the source distribution (obviously).
trans-unit.target: 同时创建源码和轮子。在创建轮子和源码分发之间,不要改变setup.py中的任何内容(很明显)。

trans-unit.source: Change the version in __init__.py, setup.py as well as docs/source/conf.py.
Check that everything looks correct by uploading the package to the pypi test server:
trans-unit.target: 通过上传软件包到pypi测试服务器来检查一切是否正确。

trans-unit.source: Check that you can install it in a virtualenv by running: pip install -i https://testpypi.python.org/pypi nlp
trans-unit.target: Check that you can install it in a virtualenv by running: pip install -i https://testpypi.python.org/pypi nlp

trans-unit.source: Commit these changes with the message: “Release: VERSION”
trans-unit.target: Commit these changes with the message: “Release: VERSION”

trans-unit.source: Copy the release notes from RELEASE.md to the tag in github once everything is looking hunky-dory.
trans-unit.target: 将RELEASE.md中的发布说明复制到github中的标签中,一旦一切看起来都很顺利。

trans-unit.source: For the sources, run: “python setup.py sdist” You should now have a /dist directory with both .whl and .tar.gz source versions.
trans-unit.target: For the sources, run: “python setup.py sdist” You should now have a /dist directory with both .whl and .tar.gz source versions.

trans-unit.source: For the wheel, run: “python setup.py bdist_wheel” in the top level directory. (this will build a wheel for the python version you use to build it).
trans-unit.target: For the wheel, run: “python setup.py bdist_wheel” in the top level directory. (this will build a wheel for the python version you use to build it).

trans-unit.source: HuggingFace/NLP is an open library of NLP datasets.
trans-unit.target: HuggingFace/NLP是一个开放的NLP数据集库。

trans-unit.source: Simple check list for release from AllenNLP repo: https://github.com/allenai/allennlp/blob/master/setup.py
trans-unit.target: Simple check list for release from AllenNLP repo: https://github.com/allenai/allennlp/blob/master/setup.py

trans-unit.source: To create the package for pypi.
Update README.md to redirect to correct documentation.
trans-unit.target: 更新 README.md,重定向到正确的文档。

trans-unit.source: Update the documentation commit in .circleci/deploy.sh for the accurate documentation to be displayed
trans-unit.target: 更新.circleci/deploy.sh中的文档提交,以便显示准确的文档。

trans-unit.source: Upload the final version to actual pypi: twine upload dist/* -r pypi
trans-unit.target: 将最终版本上传到实际的pypi中:twine upload dist/*-r pypi。

trans-unit.source: twine upload dist/* -r pypitest (pypi suggest using twine as other methods upload files via plaintext.) You may have to specify the repository url, use the following command then: twine upload dist/* -r pypitest –repository-url=https://test.pypi.org/legacy/
trans-unit.target: twine upload dist/* -r pypitest (pypi suggest using twine as other methods upload files via plaintext.) You may have to specify the repository url, use the following command then: twine upload dist/* -r pypitest –repository-url=https://test.pypi.org/legacy/
